author: hatakeyamak
body:
#### PR description:

This PR updates scripts to be used for PF validation on-the-fly operations (i.e. not for central relval running).
We also used this opportunity to clean up unused scripts Validation/RecoParticleFlow/tmp.

#### PR validation:

Tested with 10824.0, 11634.0, and 23234.0 to ensure that nothing didn't break unexpectedly.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This is NOT a backport.

@juska @bendavid @rovere
title: PF validation script update for 11_2 (and some directory cleanup)
